pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modelling and Analysis of Real-Time PCR Data // Sigmoidal model fitting, optimal model selection and calculation of various features that are essential in the analysis of quantitative real-time polymerase chain reaction (qPCR), according to Ritz Spiess (2008) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btn227 and Spiess et al. (2008) doi:10.1186/1471-2105-9-221.
